user.location: Where the progress is measured in pints...or maybe not...who knows!

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 10 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more Level 3!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 15 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 4!

Some may argue that wine is better than beer, especially in a country so well known for its vineyards. We all know they’re wrong. Cheers! That’s 5 beers from a brewery in Italy. Try 5 more for Level 2.
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink a new beer on three Thursdays in a 30 day period! Find out how New Brew Thursday was started, and catch up on old episodes.

Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 50 distinct venues!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 10 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more Level 3!

user.bio: I love craft beers and the complexity they bring. Love stouts and porters of the dark side. IPA's now! But cheap is good
